info.name: opsview mobile app
info.description: Postman collection for the OpsView Mobile App APIs. This collection contains all the relevant endpoints needed for the mobile application including authentication, profile management, mobile verification, task management, and exam data retrieval.

item.name: 1. Authentication

exec: console.log("Access token saved to collection variable");

request.description: Authenticate an operator using exam code, username, and password. On successful login, returns access token and user details including exam and center information for the confirmation screen.

item.description: Login and authentication endpoints for the operator

request.description: Creates a new mobile verification request and sends an OTP to the given 10-digit mobile number. The contact must be a 10-digit Indian mobile number without the +91 country code.

variable.description: Verification ID received from the initiate request

request.description: Verifies the OTP for the given verification ID and marks it as VERIFIED on success. The OTP must match the one sent to the mobile number.

variable.description: Verification ID received from the initiate request
Verification ID received from the initiate request

request.description: Re-sends an OTP for an existing verification ID. No mobile number is needed again as it uses the one from the original request.

response.name: Already verified Resend OTP

variable.description: Verification ID received from the initiate request

item.name: 3. Profile Management

request.description:
Creates a new operator profile with selfie image and profile details. Required every login. The request must be sent as multipart/form-data with:
- file: Mandatory selfie image with geo-tag and timestamp
- payload: JSON string containing profile details including name, contact, Aadhaar, liveness check results, and mobile verification ID

Profile is created per exam + shift + user.

response.body:

item.description: Operator profile creation and management endpoints

item.name: 4. Exam & Data Download

request.description: Fetches exam details for offline use. Should be called after profile creation to download all exam data including shifts, centers, and related information.

query.description: Optional shift ID to filter tasks for a specific shift

request.description: Returns all tasks assigned to the logged-in operator. If shiftId is provided, tasks are filtered for that shift; otherwise, tasks across all shifts are returned. Used for downloading task data for offline work.

response.name: Operator Tasks Retrieved
Success Get Operator Tasks

query.description: Optional shift ID to filter tasks for a specific shift

formdata.description: Task update payload as JSON string

variable.description: Unique ID of the task (not taskId but id)

request.description:
Updates an existing task with captured image and metadata. Used for submitting task captures with geo-tag, timestamp, and distance information.

Required headers include device information (IMEI, model, brand), location (latitude, longitude), app version, and profile ID.

The payload includes:
- taskMessage: Optional message field per task
- submittedAt: Timestamp when the task was submitted in UTC
- fenceStatus: Whether capture was INSIDE, OUTSIDE, or UNKNOWN relative to center fence
- distFromCenter: Distance in meters from center coordinates
- location: Human-readable location name

Image ID format: examCode_centercode_service_date_shift_taskid
